channel.title: Rstudio on Daniel Wing
channel.description: Recent content in Rstudio on Daniel Wing

item.title: Blogdown 101
item.description: Intro I am not an expert on Blogdown nor Hugo, I am merely taking notes to myself and making them public for anyone to read in case they find them useful To go over the basic steps to get started with Blogdown and post a site online for free Prerequisites: You need RStudio and R installed in your computer in a different post I explain how to go over this.
